info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 2:00PM MDT until May 11 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CLAY AND NORTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 300 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Union Grove State Park, or 10 miles south of Beresford, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Beresford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
